Reviews.Title: It works in the US.
Reviews.Author: Linda Redding
Reviews.Content: This TV is primarily designed to work overseas.  I purchased this TV as well as a multi-regional DVD player to watch PAL DVDs while living in the US.  An adaptor plug needs to be purchased if living in the US. Once I had an adaptor plug and an HDMI cable, the TV setup was easy.  The color is good, the picture is crisp and I'm thoroughly enjoying it.  An amplifier would help the sound quality.  That may be my next purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sony 40BX400 40" Multi-System LCD HDTV
The Sony KLV-40BX400 40" Multi System LCD TV is notable for its ability to receive local programming anywhere in the world.
For starters, the KLV-40BX400 delivers Full HD in 1080p (1920 x 1080) resolution for an incredibly crisp picture.
Sony includes multiple sound modes, including Dynamic/Standard/Clear Voice and surround sound to ensure that you're a part of the action
It's a snap to access all of its features through its graphic user interface and full-featured remote control
